controls.title: NGINX version
controls.desc: The required version of NGINX should be installed.

descriptions.label: default
descriptions.data: The required version of NGINX should be installed.

controls.code:
control 'nginx-version' do
  impact 1.0
  title 'NGINX version'
  desc 'The required version of NGINX should be installed.'
  describe nginx do
    its('version') { should cmp >= input('nginx_version') }
  end
end

results.code_desc: Nginx Environment version is expected to cmp >= "1.10.3"

controls.title: NGINX modules
controls.desc: The required NGINX modules should be installed.

descriptions.label: default
descriptions.data: The required NGINX modules should be installed.

controls.code:
control 'nginx-modules' do
  impact 1.0
  title 'NGINX modules'
  desc 'The required NGINX modules should be installed.'
  required_modules = input('nginx_modules')
  describe nginx do
    required_modules.each do |required_module|
      its('modules') { should include required_module }
    end
  end
end

results.code_desc: Nginx Environment modules is expected to include "http_ssl"
Nginx Environment modules is expected to include "stream_ssl"
Nginx Environment modules is expected to include "mail_ssl"

controls.title: NGINX configuration file
controls.desc: The NGINX config file should exist.

descriptions.label: default
descriptions.data: The NGINX config file should exist.

controls.code:
control 'nginx-conf-file' do
  impact 1.0
  title 'NGINX configuration file'
  desc 'The NGINX config file should exist.'
  describe file('/etc/nginx/nginx.conf') do
    it { should be_file }
  end
end

results.code_desc: File /etc/nginx/nginx.conf is expected to be file

controls.title: NGINX configuration permissions
controls.desc: The NGINX config file should owned by root, be writable only by owner, and not writeable or and readable by others.

descriptions.label: default
descriptions.data: The NGINX config file should owned by root, be writable only by owner, and not writeable or and readable by others.

results.code_desc: File /etc/nginx/nginx.conf is expected to be owned by "root"
File /etc/nginx/nginx.conf is expected to be grouped into "root"
File /etc/nginx/nginx.conf is expected not to be readable by others
results.message: expected File /etc/nginx/nginx.conf not to be readable by others

results.code_desc: File /etc/nginx/nginx.conf is expected not to be writable by others
File /etc/nginx/nginx.conf is expected not to be executable by others

controls.title: NGINX shell access
controls.desc: The NGINX shell access should be restricted to admin users.

descriptions.label: default
descriptions.data: The NGINX shell access should be restricted to admin users.

controls.code:
control 'nginx-shell-access' do
  impact 1.0
  title 'NGINX shell access'
  desc 'The NGINX shell access should be restricted to admin users.'
  non_admin_users = users.shells(/bash/).usernames
  describe "Shell access for non-admin users" do
    it "should be removed." do
      failure_message = "These non-admin should not have shell access: #{non_admin_users.join(", ")}"
      expect(non_admin_users).to be_in(input('admin_users')), failure_message
    end
  end
end

results.code_desc: Shell access for non-admin users should be removed.
